Title: SpankChain - First adult coin backed up by pornstars
Body: I like the setup of the whitepaper. Their system sounds really interesting although the different tokens are making it a bit difficult in my opinion which is a shame.  But to be able to become succesful its important to be backed by the industry. Their team is hugely disappointing on that area.  They have 23-year old Janice, but she is only active in the industry for just 4 years (nice for marketing things but far from being important to get things done in the industry).  And the only one other person who has experience in the industry is Kayden, which is a prety good name (not huge, but ok), but as i read in the whitepaper she is just a "brand ambassador," meaning she probably doesnt do much for the project besides popping up in some promo videos and stuff like that. But ok, maybe im seeing this wrong. And she might also have a few connections which is always handy.  And dont get me wrong i dont mean this in a bad way. Overall it looks like a great project, but some well connected people on different layers in the industry would have given it way more weight.

Author: mich
Title: SpankChain - First adult coin backed up by pornstars
Body: It took a while but now it is here    https://www.coindesk.com/spankchain-launches-crypto-payments-service-for-adult-content?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=coindesk&utm_term=&utm_content=&utm_campaign=Organic%20  Adult industry-oriented blockchain project SpankChain has launched a cryptocurrency payments platform.  Dedicated to helping adult content providers maintain a reliable payments provider in the face of a largely reluctant traditional finance industry, the new SpankPay service allows users to pay with cryptocurrencies including bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH) and litecoin (LTC), as well as the “privacy coins” zcash (ZEC) and monero (XMR).  “With SpankPay, we are bringing immediate value to adult merchants by helping them accept crypto, avoid chargebacks, and reach a global audience,” said Ameen Soleimani, CEO of SpankChain.

Author: TraderEst
Title: SpankChain - First adult coin backed up by pornstars
Body: Article about SpankChain on Forbes: https://www.forbes.com/sites/zarastone/2017/10/25/how-spankchain-an-x-rated-blockchain-plans-to-provide-pornstars-with-better-payment-plans/#62cf0b4a3659  It's a pretty interesting token in terms of potential hype and media attention. First live cam show has already aired, the've got coverage by to big media outlets, they have first rank pornstars as spokepersons. It's pretty likely we'll see more of them in the news. Not sure how far they are with the tech, it's advancing at least as much as my limited technical knowledge allows to understand.  They're solving a real problem also, helping adult industry workers get better payment systems, currently most financial companies don't want to work with them and the ones that do ask a very big 20-50% fee for money transfers. Spankchain would charge 5% in case of camgirls.  The actresses are interested in using the token, the bit more tricky part comes with getting the customers to use it also. But with enough (social) media attention and hype possibilities this  Here's why this could be a big winner in coming days, weeks and months: It has flown relatively under the radar. It's only been trading for 1,5 months and on 2-3 smaller exchanges, Etherdelta and Cryptopia. Today it rose close over 100% with just turnover of under a million or less than 1% of current mcap. That means, that current holders are not too interested in selling at close to current prices. If and when it gets to bigger exchanges, it will soar, probably even sooner. It's getting discovered already, the turnover is rising and so is the market price.   Enjoy their twitter: https://twitter.com/spankchain  Disclaimer: I own it.
